snippet.title: Sphere of Influence | Release Trailer | Victoria 3
snippet.description:
Victoria 3: Sphere of Influence - buy now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2411231

Put your diplomatic skill to the ultimate test in Sphere of Influence, a new expansion to Victoria 3.
Pull other nations into your orbit through diplomacy, economic leverage or straightforward bribery. Sphere of Influence adds many new actions and systems to illustrate the quick moving nature of diplomatic relations in this dramatic era.

Main features:
- Power Blocs: customise your Power Bloc - decide what kind of values it stands for and give bloc members powerful bonuses in addition to customising your own bloc emblem and banner.
- Foreign Investment: invest in the economies of any willing countries around the world - regardless of if they are your subjects or not.
- “The Great Game”: Interact with new events and Journal Entries, related to British and Russian rivalry over Central Asia - or join the local powers in the struggle to remain independent.

Pick up the Expansion Pass and complete the Victoria 3 experience - a truly revolutionary deal: https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/32180/Victoria_3_Expansion_Pass/

__________________

#Paradoxinteractive #Victoria3 #Grandstrategy
